description: Documentation for 9.7.14.6.2. Matrix fragments for multiply-accumulate operation with sparse matrix A

files.title: Overview
files.summary: In this section we describe how the contents of thread registers are associated with fragments of various matrices and the sparsity metadata. The following conventions are used throughout this section:

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.1. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k16 with .f16 and .bf16 types
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k16` with `.f16` / `.bf16` floating point type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k16`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.2. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k32 with .f16 and .bf16 types
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k32` with `.f16` / `.bf16` floating point type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k32`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.3. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k16 with .tf32 floating point type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k16` with `.tf32` floating point type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k16`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.4. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k8 with .tf32 floating point type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k8` with `.tf32` floating point type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k8`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.5. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k32 with .u8 / .s8 integer type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k32` with `.u8` / `.s8` integer type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k32`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.6. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k64 with .u8 / .s8 / .e4m3 / .e5m2 type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k64` with `.u8` / `.s8`/ `.e4m3`/ `.e5m2` / `.e3m2` / `.e2m3` / `.e2m1` type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k64`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.7. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k64 with .u4 / .s4 integer type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k64` with `.u4` / `.s4` integer type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k64`.

files.title: 9.7.14.6.2.8. Matrix Fragments for sparse mma.m16n8k128 with .u4 / .s4 integer type
files.summary: A warp executing sparse `mma.m16n8k128` with `.u4` / `.s4` / `.e2m1` integer type will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m16n8k128`.
